comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5050946025/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5083436423/] Blanca Elena Errázuriz Vergara (April 9, 1894 - March 20, 1940), also known as Bianca de Saulles was accused and later acquitted of killing her first husband, John de Saulles. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blanca_Err%C3%A1zuriz
